attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Id of the component

attribute.name: rendered
attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the visibility of the component

attribute.name: binding
attribute.description: An EL expression that maps to a server-side component instance in a backing bean

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Value of the component that can be either an EL expression or a literal text

attribute.name: var
attribute.description: Name of the request-scoped variable that'll be used as the holder of each rowdata before processing a row

attribute.name: rows
attribute.description: Number of rows to display per page

attribute.name: first
attribute.description: Index of the first row to be displayed

attribute.name: widgetVar
attribute.description: Javascript variable name of the wrapped yui widget

attribute.name: scrollIncrement
attribute.description: Number of items to scroll

attribute.name: circular
attribute.description: When true, enables continous scrolling, default is false

attribute.name: vertical
attribute.description: Set vertical orientation, default is false

attribute.name: autoPlayInterval
attribute.description: Set this time in milli-seconds to have the Carousel scroll the elements automatically

attribute.name: revealAmount
attribute.description: The percentage of the item to be revealed on each side of the Carousel

attribute.name: animate
attribute.description: When enabled scrolling is animated, animation is turned on by default

attribute.name: speed
attribute.description: Sets the speed of the scrolling animation, default is 0.5

attribute.name: effect
attribute.description: Sets the animation effect

attribute.name: pagerPrefix
attribute.description: Prefix text of the pager dropdown

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Style of the main container.

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the main container.

attribute.name: itemStyle
attribute.description: Style of each item container.

attribute.name: itemStyleClass
attribute.description: Style of each item container.
